entry.title: https://github.com/ChristianLempa/boilerplates
entry.content: This is my personal template collection. Here you'll find templates, and configurations for various tools, and technologies.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-cloudfront-s3-cdn
entry.content: Terraform module to easily provision CloudFront CDN backed by an S3 origin

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-cloudtrail-s3-bucket
entry.content: S3 bucket with built in IAM policy to allow CloudTrail logs

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-container-definition
entry.content: Terraform module to generate well-formed JSON documents (container definitions) that are passed to the aws_ecs_task_definition Terraform resource

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-iam-system-user
entry.content: Terraform Module to Provision a Basic IAM System User Suitable for CI/CD Systems (E.g. TravisCI, CircleCI)

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-s3-bucket
entry.content: Terraform module that creates an S3 bucket with an optional IAM user for external CI/CD systems

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-s3-log-storage
entry.content: This module creates an S3 bucket suitable for receiving logs from other AWS services such as S3, CloudFront, and CloudTrail

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-sso
entry.content: Terraform module to configure AWS Single Sign-On (SSO)

entry.title: https://github.com/kube-hetzner/terraform-hcloud-kube-hetzner
entry.content: Optimized and Maintenance-free Kubernetes on Hetzner Cloud in one command!
